name: That's a Planet
description:
Have you ever wanted to remove the Hydrogen from Gas Giants... Or Terraform Mercury? Well, That's a Planet lets you do just that!

While still being in active development, The current features of 0.1.0 include:

  • Explode planets
  • Remove their Atmosphere/Hydrogen
  • Terraform them
  • Create Satellites around them
  • Land on them and their Moons
  • Many more!
